plot: Miguel, a famous artist, meets Sofia, a children's books publisher, in a gallery. She goes to his studio to take a flash lesson that will change her life.
title: Lección relámpago
plot_es: Miguel, a famous artist, meets Sofia, a children's books publisher, in a gallery. She goes to his studio to take a flash lesson that will change her life.
plot_en: Miguel, a famous artist, meets Sofia, a children's books publisher, in a gallery. She goes to his studio to take a flash lesson that will change her life.
